external_references.description: Cybereason Nocturnus. (2022, May 4). Operation CuckooBees: Deep-Dive into Stealthy Winnti Techniques. Retrieved September 22, 2022.

description: During [Operation CuckooBees](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0012), the threat actors executed an encoded VBScript file using `wscript` and wrote the decoded output to a text file.(Citation: Cybereason OperationCuckooBees May 2022)
